projects.title: Statistical Analysis of University Salaries
projects.description: A detailed Statistical Analysis of salaries of employees at a US university. Used methods like 2 Sample T Tests and Proportion Tests to uncover bias in salaries of males and females. This study also analyzes possible biases in promotion periods.

projects.title: Content Wars! OTT Platforms Analysis Dashboard
projects.description: A one-stop Tableau dashboard to compare Netflix, Prime Video, HBO & Disney+. Compare Top Content across platforms by user popularity and awards like Oscars/Emmy's. Features Analyst Mode for worldwide presence and revenue analysis.

projects.title: Customer Trends Dashboard with Graph ML
projects.description: 1st Runner Up at HackRx 4 Hackathon (INR 50K prize). Analyzed Amazon Product Purchases graph dataset using GraphML algorithms to find baskets of frequently bought items. Built customer trends dashboard with React and stored graph data using JanusGraph.

projects.title: Rehabify Web-App
projects.description: 1st Place at Applab Hackathon (INR 25K prize). Built within 36 hours - a website to aid in rehabilitation from substance addiction. Deployed as a React app incorporating DAST (Digital Addiction Screen Test).

projects.title: Reinforcement Learning & AI Lab Projects
projects.description: Collection of projects on AI topics including Reinforcement Learning, Problem Solving, Multi Arm Bandits, Markov Decision Process, Monte Carlo Methods, SARSA and Q Learning.

projects.title: Object Detection (CV) for DronAid UAVs
projects.description: Project for AI Team of Dronaid.in (2022-23). Trained Object Detection models including YOLO and ResNet for deployment on Drones (UAVs) for search and rescue operations.

projects.title: Deep Learning Lab Projects
projects.description: Projects covering Deep Learning topics including Convolutional Neural Networks, Recurrent Neural Networks, LSTMs, GRU, Wide & Deep Networks and Deep & Cross Networks.

projects.title: API Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: 1st Place at eSamudaay Hackathon (INR 25K prize). Developed a Business Dashboard to analyze Customer Purchasing Behavior and API analytics within 48 hours.

projects.title: MovieMatch - ML based Movie Recommendations
projects.description: Built a movie recommender model and deployed it as a website. Recommendations based on cosine similarity using features like genre, director, and description keywords. Deployed with HTML-CSS-JS and MongoDB.

projects.title: IPL Scores & Analytics Database
projects.description: A comprehensive SQL database project for IPL cricket scores and analytics. Designed relational schema and wrote complex queries for sports analytics insights.

projects.title: Landslide Prediction Research Project
projects.description: Research project to predict landslides in the Western Ghats region using GIS data. Used GIS & Remote Sensing data to identify Landslide Causing Factors. Led a team of 3 members under faculty mentorship.

projects.title: Machine Learning Lab Projects
projects.description: Collection of projects covering ML & Data Analytics topics including Clustering, Collaborative Filtering, Regression, KNN, Naive Bayes & Support Vector Machines.

projects.title: Vision Language Action (LLM) models for Robotics
Sequel2SQL - Agentic AI System to optimize SQL queries
